meta.name: Richard Osman's Festive House of Games
meta.description: A group of famous faces go toe-to-toe, testing their general knowledge in a variety of fun trivia-based games.

videos.title: Festive Week 1: Day 1
videos.overview: Mathew Baynton, Mel Giedroyc, Harriet Kemsley and Charles Venn test their general knowledge skills for a special festive show in Richard Osman's Festive House of Games.
